abstract: Apollo Management agreed to cut fees for Calpers, in a sign that investment managers are willing to negotiate their agreements with their biggest investors.
snippet: Apollo Management agreed to cut fees for Calpers, in a sign that investment managers are willing to negotiate their agreements with their biggest investors.
lead_paragraph: Apollo Management agreed on Monday to concessions for its oldest and largest investor, Calpers, cutting its fees for certain funds and dropping the use of placement agents to gain business from the California pension fund.

headline.main: Apollo Agrees to Cut Some Fees for Calpers

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
